message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take a bit more to start, but we both get something.
Your offer was a bit imbalanced, Alice. Let's make it fairer. I'll take a little more this time.
Okay, Bob, let's find a compromise. I've adjusted my offer slightly.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. A fair deal is better than endless haggling.
